Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/041caa78de6e28c0c93aa7e30fac66cd/tumblr_inline_nyfqrrc1wS1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><p><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/v/27009897">http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/v/27009897</a><br/></p><p>Some people get to space but Kofeyh decided to create a plane! .If you want to have a good time and watch something different Kofeyh is a great option! #KSP .<br/><br/></p>
